metadata.name: WORLD WAR 3
metadata.description:
In the morning, February 24.02.2022, Russia attacked Ukrainian cities without declaring war. The aggressor uses cluster bombs, cruise missiles, hydrogen bombs, etc. Millions of people have fled their homes, thousands have been killed, including womens and childrens.
All money from this NFT will go to charity:
❤️ Half for humanitarian aid to Ukrainians
⚔ ​​Half of the Armed Forces of Ukraine

You can also help Ukrainians in their struggle for our land:
ukrainewar.carrd.co
